name: Peak Myths
description:
Climb your way to the top in the chillest new battle royale, Peak Myths! Totally free to play. Nothing wrong here. Can you collect all 64 amazing cosmetic items?!

Known bugs!

  1. Sound is broken! It breaks every time I make a build, trying to fix it asap!
  2. Head items disappear from head page
  3. legendary item purchasing from the shop not working
  4. level and total number of items not displaying properly
